00002 #include <stdlib.h>

00006 static const double ATOL=1e-8;
00007 static const double RTOL=1e-9;
00008 
00009 namespace MConf {
00010 
00011 //****************************************************************************
00012 // class RightHandSide must provide the operator() (double t, double *y, double *f)
00013 //  describing the system of ODE dy/dt = f(t,y)
00014 class RightHandSide {
00015 public:
00016   virtual void operator() (double fi,const double *y,double *yp) = 0; 
00017 };
00018 
00019 //****************************************************************************
00021 class rkf45
00022 {
00023 public:
00024   rkf45() { init(0,1); }
00025   rkf45(RightHandSide *rhs, int neqn,double atol=ATOL,double rtol=RTOL) {
00026     init(rhs,neqn,atol,rtol);
00027   }
00028   void init(RightHandSide *rhs,int neqn, double atol=ATOL,double rtol=RTOL) {
00029     this->a_tol=atol;
00030     this->r_tol=rtol;
00031     this->neqn=neqn;
00032     this->rhs=rhs;
00033     iflag = 1;
00034     y.reserve(neqn);
00035     y.resize(neqn);
00036     work.reserve(3+6*neqn);
00037     work.resize(3+6*neqn);
00038   }
00039   void init() {
00040     iflag = 1;
00041   }
00042   virtual ~rkf45() {;}
00043 
00044 // advance u from t to tout
00045   void advance(double *u, double &t, double tout)
00046   {
00047     double * wrk = &(work[0]);
00048     rkf_45 (*rhs,neqn,u,t,tout,r_tol,a_tol,iflag,wrk,iwork);
00049     if(iflag>2) {  
00050       std::cerr<<"rk45_flag="<<iflag<<std::endl;
00051       iflag = 2;
00052     }    
00053   }
00054 
00055 private:
00056 // set start point
00057   void setStart(double &t,double *u) 
00058   {
00059     t; // to avoid warning: unreferenced parameter
00060     for(size_t i=0; i<y.size(); ++i) y[i] = u[i];
00061     iflag = 1;
00062   }
00063 // advance u from t to tout
00064   void advance1(double *u, double &t, double tout)
00065   {
00066     if(iflag == 1) {
00067       for(size_t i=0; i<y.size(); ++i) y[i] = u[i];
00068     }
00069     rkf_45 (*rhs,neqn,&(y[0]),t,tout,r_tol,a_tol,iflag,&(work[0]),iwork);
00070     if(iflag>2) { 
00071       std::cerr<<"rk45_flag="<<iflag<<std::endl;
00072       iflag = 2;
00073     }    
00074     for(size_t i=0; i<y.size(); ++i) u[i] = y[i];
00075   }
00076 
00077 private:
00078 // class RightHandSide must provide the operator() (double t, double *y, double *f)
00079 //  describing the system of ODE dy/dt = f(t,y)
00080   RightHandSide *rhs; 
00081   int neqn,iflag;
00082   double a_tol;
00083   double r_tol;
00084   std::vector<double> y;        // array[neqn]
00085   std::vector<double> work;     // array[3+6*neqn]
00086   int iwork[5]; 
00087 
00088   void fehl(RightHandSide &rhs,int neqn,
00089             double* y,double &t,double h,double* yp,double* f1,
00090             double* f2,double* f3,double* f4,double* f5,double* s);

00093             double& t,double& tout,double& relerr,double abserr,int& iflag,

00095             double* f4,double* f5,double* savre,double* savae,int* nfe,
00096             int* kop,int* init,int* jflag,int* kflag);
